description.value: The Cobbleguard can Burrow through any earthen matter, including rock and worked stone. When it does so, the Cobbleguard moves at its full burrow Speed, leaving no tunnels or signs of its passing.

Trigger: An ally within 25 feet that the Cobbleguard can see would take damage from a melee or ranged attack.

Effect: The Cobbleguard may Stride and end this movement within 5 feet of the attacked ally. The Cobbleguard takes the damage of the triggering attack in place of their ally. This damage may not be reduced, prevented, or redirected in any way
If the target is within 5 feet of one of the Cobbleguard's allies, they must pass a @Check[fortitude|basic]or be knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.
